title: Padre Island National Seashore: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Bookstore         The Malaquite Visitor Center bookstore is operated by Western National Parks Association. NPS photo  The bookstore at Malaquite Visitor Center is operated by Western National Parks Association. The store offers postcards, posters, magnets, bookmarks, sun care products, and personal hygiene items in addition to a wide variety of books. For more information, please call Malaquite Visitor Center at (361) 949-8068 or email us.  Please note that currently no food or ice is available for sale in the park.
